TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LogStore extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class LogStore Implements IDisposable
public ref class LogStore sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: Represents a log-structured storage.

span.span: Represents a log-structured storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供记录序列接口在公用日志文件系统 (CLFS) 日志之上的实现。The class provides an implementation of the record sequence interface on top of a Common Log File System (CLFS) log. 它与 类一起使用，该类提供了直接操作和管理 CLFS 日志文件的接口。It works with the class, which provides an interface for directly manipulating and managing a CLFS log file. 日志存储区提供跨一组磁盘范围的仅追加存储区。A log store provides append-only storage across a set of disk extents. 类表示此存储区，并提供了添加和移除容器、设置策略以及创建存档的方法。The class represents this storage, and provides methods for adding and removing containers, setting policy, and creating archives. 它不提供从存储区中读取和写入存储区的方法；这些方法是由 类提供的。It does not provide methods for reading from and writing to the storage; these methods are provided by the class. 类和 类之间的关系类似于磁盘文件和 对象之间的关系。The relationship between the class and the class is similar to the relationship between a disk file and a object. 磁盘文件提供实际存储区，并具有诸如长度和上次访问时间这样的属性，而 对象提供文件的视图，利用该视图可以从实际存储区中读取以及向其中写入数据。The disk file provides the actual storage and has attributes such as length and last access time, while the object provides a view on the file that can be used to read from it and write to it. 与之类似， 类具有诸如策略和磁盘范围集合这样的属性， 类提供面向记录的机制，用于读取和写入数据。Similarly, the class has attributes like a policy and a collection of disk extents, and the class provides a record-oriented mechanism for reading and writing data. 与 类表示的文件记录序列不同， 实例将其数据存储在 实例表示的磁盘范围的集合中。Unlike the file record sequence represented by the class, a instance stores its data in a collection of disk extents, represented by instances. 给定 实例中的所有范围都具有统一的大小，空间以范围增量的形式添加到 实例中及从其中移除。The extents in a given instance are all of uniform size, and space is added to and removed from a instance in extent increments. 若要添加和移除日志范围，请使用可由 属性返回的 对象的 和 方法。To add and remove log extents, use the and methods of the object, which can be returned by the property. 实例可以具有与自己关联的策略。A instance can have policies associated with it. 这些策略由 实例表示，这些实例可由 属性返回。These are represented by instances that can be returned by the property. 策略定义日志应遵循的规则（例如最大范围数和最小大小），以及对在特定条件下扩大或缩小 的指令。A policy dictates rules that the log will attempt to follow, such as maximum number of extents and minimum size, and instructions on growing or shrinking the under certain conditions. 此外，还可以指定是否能够存档 实例。In addition, you can specify whether a instance can be archived. 策略针对每个日志设置，而且是可变的。这表示，一旦日志的每个句柄都关闭了，策略也就不再存在了。Policies are set per log and are volatile, which means that once every handle to the log is closed, the policy no longer exists. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 存档到 XML 文档。The following example shows how to archive a to an XML document. [!code-csharp[logarchievesnapshot#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/logarchievesnapshot/cs/logarchievesnapshot.cs#0)] [!code-vb[logarchievesnapshot#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/logarchievesnapshot/vb/logarchievesnapshot.vb#0)]

Public Sub New (path As String, mode As FileMode)

param.name: path
param.span: A relative or absolute path for the base file of the log store to open.

param.name: mode
param.span: One of the values that determines how to open or create the store.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified path and mode.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified path and mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数打开具有指定路径和模式的日志存储区。Use this constructor to open a log store with the specified path and mode. 存储区以读/写访问权限打开，并共享读访问权限。The store is opened with read/write access, and shares read access. `path` 参数应使用以下语法：The `path` parameter should use the following syntax: `log:[::]` 其中 `` 是日志文件的有效路径，`` 是唯一客户端标识符。where `` is a valid path to a log file, and `` is a unique client identifier. 日志存储区应是物理日志存储区或虚拟日志存储区，但不能同时为两者。A log store should be either a physical log store or a virtual log store, but not both. 以物理或虚拟方式创建日志存储区后，它在整个生命周期中都将保持该形态。Once a log store has been created physically or virtually, it remains so for its lifetime. 物理日志存储区是通过仅指定物理日志名称来创建的。A physical log store is created by specifying only the physical log name. 虚拟日志存储区是通过指定物理日志名称和日志客户端名称来创建的。A virtual log store is created by specifying both the physical log name and the log client name. 共享同一个物理日志名称的客户端将共享相同的范围集合与策略。Clients that share the same physical log name share the same extents collection and policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数打开具有指定的路径、模式和访问权限的新日志存储区。Use this constructor to open a new log store with the specified path, mode, and access. 并打开了存储区以共享读访问权限。The store is opened sharing read access. `path` 参数应使用以下语法：The `path` parameter should use the following syntax: `log:[::]` 其中 `` 是日志文件的有效路径，`` 是唯一客户端标识符。where `` is a valid path to a log file, and `` is a unique client identifier. 日志存储区应是物理日志存储区或虚拟日志存储区，但不能同时为两者。A log store should be either a physical log store or a virtual log store, but not both. 以物理或虚拟方式创建日志存储区后，它在整个生命周期中都将保持该形态。Once a log store has been created physically or virtually, it remains so for its lifetime. 物理日志存储区是通过仅指定物理日志名称来创建的。A physical log store is created by specifying only the physical log name. 虚拟日志存储区是通过指定物理日志名称和日志客户端名称来创建的。A virtual log store is created by specifying both the physical log name and the log client name. 共享同一个物理日志名称的客户端将共享相同的范围集合与策略。Clients that share the same physical log name share the same extents collection and policy.

returns.span: A object that contains the state necessary to make an archive.

span.span: A object that contains the state necessary to make an archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的存档快照包含从基序列号或存档序列号（两者的较低者）到最新序列号之间的信息。The archive snapshot returned from this method encompasses information from either the base sequence number or the archive sequence number, whichever is lower, to the last sequence number. 其中不包含最新序列号，这表示，存档仅包含截至但不包括最后一条的记录。It is not inclusive for the last sequence number, which means that the archive only includes records up to but not including last. 此外，使用此方法时，起始 SequenceNumber 必须等于 BaseSequenceNumber，以保证存档的一致性。In addition, when using this method, the start SequenceNumber must be equal to the BaseSequenceNumber in order for the archive to be consistent.

exception.span: or is not between the base and last sequence numbers of this sequence.

span.span: or is not between the base and last sequence numbers of this sequence.

exception.span: is larger than .

span.span: is larger than .

exception.span: An invalid operation has been executed.

span.span: An invalid operation has been executed.

exception.span: An I/O error occurs when creating the archive snapshot.

span.span: An I/O error occurs when creating the archive snapshot.

exception.span: The log store is not archivable.

span.span: The log store is not archivable.

exception.span: The method was called after the sequence has been disposed of.

span.span: The method was called after the sequence has been disposed of.

exception.span: There is not enough memory to continue the execution of a program.

span.span: There is not enough memory to continue the execution of a program.

exception.span: The record sequence is full.

span.span: The record sequence is full.

exception.span: Access for the specified log store is denied by the operating system.

span.span: Access for the specified log store is denied by the operating system.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: Releases all resources used by the .

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完 之后，调用 。Call when you have finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 之后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器能够回收 占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

exception.span: The method was called after the sequence has been disposed of.

span.span: The method was called after the sequence has been disposed of.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Extents As LogExtentCollection
public: property System::IO::Log::LogExtentCollection ^ Extents { System::IO::Log::LogExtentCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the collection of log extents that contain the data for this log store.

span.span: Gets the collection of log extents that contain the data for this log store.

value.span: 一个包含日志范围集合的 实例，该集合中封装了此日志存储区的数据。

span.span: A instance containing the collection of log extents that encapsulates data for this log store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例将其数据存储在磁盘范围的集合中，这些范围由 实例表示。A instance stores its data in a collection of disk extents, represented by instances. 给定 实例中的所有范围都具有统一的大小，空间以范围增量的形式添加到 实例中及从其中移除。The extents in a given instance are all of uniform size, and space is added to and removed from a instance in extent increments. 若要添加和移除日志范围，请使用由此属性返回的 对象的 和 方法。To add and remove log extents, use the and methods of the object, which is returned by this property.
